products.title: Orange Juice
products.description: Freshly squeezed, pure orange juice packed with Vitamin C. A classic and refreshing start to any day.

products.title: Apple Juice
products.description: Crisp and sweet apple juice made from the finest hand-picked apples. Clear, refreshing, and naturally delicious.

products.title: Mango Juice
products.description: Thick, sweet, and luscious juice made from ripe mangoes. A tropical delight that tastes like summer in a glass.

products.title: Mixed Fruit Juice
products.description: A delicious blend of various fruits like apple, orange, pineapple, and banana for a balanced and nutritious drink.

products.title: Pineapple Juice
products.description: Tangy and sweet juice from fresh pineapples, offering a vibrant tropical flavor and digestive benefits.

products.title: Pomegranate Juice
products.description: Rich and tart 100% pomegranate juice, packed with antioxidants. A healthy and flavorful choice.

products.title: Grape Juice
products.description: Sweet and smooth juice made from ripe, dark grapes. A classic beverage enjoyed by all ages.

products.title: Sugarcane Juice
products.description: A natural and refreshing sweet juice extracted from pressed sugarcane stalks, often with a hint of ginger and lemon.

products.title: Guava Juice
products.description: A unique, sweet and slightly tangy juice with the distinct flavor of tropical guava. Rich in Vitamin C.

products.title: Cranberry Juice
products.description: Tart and refreshing cranberry juice, known for its health benefits and vibrant red color. Perfect on its own or in mocktails.

products.title: Lemon Iced Tea
products.description: The classic refresher. Crisp black tea chilled and blended with a zesty lemon flavor for a perfectly balanced drink.

products.title: Peach Iced Tea
products.description: A sweet and fragrant iced tea infused with the juicy flavor of ripe peaches. A delightful summer beverage.

products.title: Green Iced Tea
products.description: A light and healthy iced tea made from green tea leaves, offering a smooth taste with a hint of honey and mint.

products.title: Raspberry Iced Tea
products.description: A vibrant and tangy iced tea bursting with the sweet and slightly tart flavor of fresh raspberries.

products.title: Unsweetened Black Iced Tea
products.description: For the tea purist. A simple, bold, and refreshing black tea, brewed and chilled to perfection with no added sugar.

products.title: Mint Mojito Iced Tea
products.description: An exciting twist on iced tea, combining refreshing mint and a hint of lime for a non-alcoholic mojito flavor.

products.title: Passion Fruit Iced Tea
products.description: An exotic and aromatic iced tea featuring the sweet and tangy taste of tropical passion fruit.

products.title: Hibiscus Berry Iced Tea
products.description: A beautiful, caffeine-free iced tea with a deep red hue, offering a tart and fruity flavor from hibiscus flowers and mixed berries.

products.title: Ginger Honey Iced Tea
products.description: A soothing yet invigorating blend of black tea with the spicy warmth of ginger and the natural sweetness of honey.

products.title: Arnold Palmer
products.description: The perfect half-and-half mix of refreshing iced tea and tangy lemonade, named after the legendary golfer.

products.title: Cold Brew Coffee
products.description: Smooth, low-acid coffee concentrate brewed with cold water over 12 hours. Served over ice for a bold, refreshing kick.

products.title: Iced Latte
products.description: A shot of rich espresso poured over chilled milk and ice. A simple, creamy, and classic cold coffee.

products.title: Cappuccino
products.description: The perfect balance of espresso, steamed milk, and a thick layer of creamy foam. A timeless Italian coffee.

products.title: Filter Coffee
products.description: Traditional South Indian filter coffee. A strong, frothy, and aromatic brew mixed with hot milk and sugar.

products.title: Americano
products.description: A shot of espresso diluted with hot water, giving it a similar strength to, but different flavor from, traditionally brewed coffee.

products.title: Mocha Frappe
products.description: An indulgent, ice-blended coffee drink combining espresso, milk, chocolate sauce, and topped with whipped cream.

products.title: Caramel Macchiato
products.description: A layered coffee drink with steamed milk, a shot of espresso, and a drizzle of sweet caramel sauce.

products.title: Instant Coffee Powder
products.description: A jar of quality instant coffee crystals for a quick and convenient cup of coffee anytime, anywhere.

products.title: Espresso
products.description: A concentrated, full-bodied coffee beverage brewed by forcing hot water under pressure through finely-ground coffee beans.

products.title: Hazelnut Cold Coffee
products.description: A creamy and frothy cold coffee blended with the rich and nutty flavor of hazelnut syrup.

products.title: Strawberry Banana Smoothie
products.description: A classic, creamy smoothie made with ripe strawberries, sweet bananas, and a splash of yogurt or milk.

products.title: Mango Pineapple Smoothie
products.description: A tropical escape in a glass. A vibrant blend of sweet mango, tangy pineapple, and creamy coconut milk.

products.title: Green Detox Smoothie
products.description: A nutrient-packed smoothie with spinach, kale, apple, and banana to cleanse and energize your body.

products.title: Berry Blast Smoothie
products.description: An antioxidant-rich blend of strawberries, blueberries, raspberries, and blackberries for a burst of fruity flavor.

products.title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Smoothie
products.description: An indulgent yet healthy smoothie that tastes like a dessert. Made with cocoa, peanut butter, banana, and protein powder.

products.title: Oatmeal Breakfast Smoothie
products.description: A wholesome and filling smoothie with rolled oats, banana, cinnamon, and a touch of maple syrup. The perfect start to your day.

products.title: Avocado Green Smoothie
products.description: A creamy, dreamy smoothie made with avocado for healthy fats, plus spinach, pineapple, and coconut water.

products.title: Watermelon Mint Cooler
products.description: An incredibly refreshing and hydrating blend of fresh watermelon, mint leaves, and a squeeze of lime.

products.title: Papaya Ginger Smoothie
products.description: A digestive-friendly smoothie with sweet papaya, a hint of spicy ginger, and turmeric for an anti-inflammatory boost.

products.title: Coffee Banana Smoothie
products.description: Get your caffeine and breakfast in one! A blend of cold brew coffee, banana, oats, and a touch of cocoa.

products.title: Classic Vanilla Milkshake
products.description: A timeless classic. Creamy vanilla ice cream blended with milk to create a smooth, sweet, and satisfying shake.

products.title: Rich Chocolate Shake
products.description: An indulgent shake for chocolate lovers, made with premium chocolate ice cream and a swirl of chocolate syrup.

products.title: Strawberry Shake
products.description: A sweet and fruity shake bursting with the flavor of fresh strawberries, blended with creamy ice cream and milk.

products.title: Oreo Cookie Shake
products.description: A crowd-pleasing blend of vanilla ice cream, milk, and crushed Oreo cookies for a cookies-and-cream delight.

products.title: Mango Milkshake
products.description: A seasonal favorite, this thick and creamy shake is made with sweet, ripe mangoes for a taste of the tropics.

products.title: Cold Coffee Shake
products.description: A perfect blend of coffee, milk, and ice cream. A creamy, frothy, and refreshing way to get your caffeine fix.

products.title: Badam Milk (Almond Milk)
products.description: A traditional Indian drink made with blended almonds, milk, cardamom, and saffron. Served chilled, it's both delicious and nutritious.

products.title: Sweet Lassi
products.description: A popular, traditional yogurt-based drink from Punjab. A creamy and refreshing blend of yogurt, water, and sugar.

products.title: Buttermilk (Chaas)
products.description: A savory and spiced Indian yogurt drink. Light and refreshing with flavors of cumin, ginger, and fresh herbs.

products.title: Turmeric Milk (Haldi Doodh)
products.description: A warm and soothing 'Golden Milk' made with milk, turmeric, and other spices like ginger and black pepper. Known for its health benefits.

products.title: Red Bull Energy Drink
products.description: The classic energy drink that gives you wings. Known for its unique flavor and ability to vitalize body and mind.

products.title: Monster Energy
products.description: A popular energy drink with a potent energy blend and a smooth, easy-drinking flavor. Unleash the beast.

products.title: Sting Energy Drink
products.description: An energizing drink with a refreshing strawberry flavor, designed to give you an instant jolt of energy.

products.title: Gatorade Blue Bolt
products.description: A sports drink designed to rehydrate, replenish, and refuel. Replaces fluids and electrolytes lost in sweat.

products.title: Thums Up Charged
products.description: The strong taste of Thums Up with an extra kick of caffeine for a powerful burst of energy.

products.title: Mountain Dew
products.description: A bold and distinctly refreshing citrus-flavored soda with a boost of caffeine. Do the Dew.

products.title: Hell Classic Energy Drink
products.description: A quality energy drink with a tutti-frutti flavor, containing active ingredients and vitamins to boost performance.

products.title: Red Bull Sugarfree
products.description: All the wings of Red Bull without the sugar. Same benefits, same taste, but with zero sugar and only 5 calories per can.

products.title: ORSL Rehydrate Drink
products.description: An electrolyte drink that helps restore body fluids and electrolytes lost due to dehydration. Comes in a refreshing orange flavor.

products.title: Campa Cricket Energy Drink
products.description: A carbonated energy drink with a crisp mango flavor, designed to keep you charged up during any activity.

products.title: Packaged Drinking Water (1L)
products.description: Pure and safe packaged drinking water that has gone through a rigorous purification process. The perfect thirst quencher.

products.title: Himalayan Natural Mineral Water (1L)
products.description: Untouched and unprocessed water sourced directly from the Himalayas, with a balanced mineral composition.

products.title: Sparkling Water
products.description: Crisp and effervescent carbonated water. A refreshing, zero-calorie alternative to sugary drinks.

products.title: Tender Coconut Water
products.description: 100% natural tender coconut water. A hydrating and electrolyte-rich drink straight from nature.

products.title: Flavoured Water (Lemon & Mint)
products.description: Still water infused with a refreshing hint of natural lemon and mint flavor. No sugar, no calories.

products.title: Alkaline Water
products.description: Water with a higher pH level, believed to help neutralize acid in the bloodstream. Known for its super-hydrating properties.

products.title: Vitamin Water (Revive)
products.description: A nutrient-enhanced water beverage with fruit punch flavor, fortified with essential vitamins and minerals.

products.title: Packaged Water (500ml)
products.description: A convenient, portable 500ml bottle of pure and safe packaged drinking water for when you're on the move.

products.title: Bisleri Soda Water
products.description: Purified water that has been carbonated. Perfect for mixing drinks or enjoying on its own for a bubbly kick.

products.title: Water Can (20L)
products.description: A large 20-litre can of packaged mineral water, ideal for home and office water dispensers.

products.title: Coca-Cola
products.description: The original and iconic cola. A globally beloved soft drink with a unique, refreshing taste.

products.title: Thums Up
products.description: A strong, fizzy, and spicy cola from India. Known for its potent taste and thunderous appeal.

products.title: Sprite
products.description: A crisp, refreshing lemon-lime flavored soft drink that quenches your thirst with its clean taste.

products.title: Fanta
products.description: A vibrant, bubbly, and fruity soft drink with a bold orange flavor. Fun and refreshing.

products.title: Pepsi
products.description: A globally recognized cola with a bold, robust, and refreshing taste. Live for now.

products.title: Limca
products.description: A lemon and lime flavored carbonated soft drink, cherished for its thirst-quenching 'lime 'n' lemoni' flavor.

products.title: Maaza Mango Drink
products.description: A non-carbonated mango fruit drink that is universally loved for its thick, sweet, and authentic mango taste.

products.title: 7 Up

products.title: Mirinda
products.description: A bold and vibrant orange-flavored carbonated soft drink that provides a burst of tangy fun.

products.title: Diet Coke
products.description: The same great taste of Coca-Cola but with no sugar and no calories. A lighter way to enjoy your favorite cola.

products.title: Classic Hot Chocolate
products.description: A rich, creamy, and comforting hot chocolate made with real cocoa and steamed milk. A timeless warm treat.

products.title: Hot Chocolate with Marshmallows
products.description: Our classic hot chocolate topped with a handful of soft, gooey mini marshmallows that melt into the drink.

products.description: For those who prefer a less sweet, more intense cocoa flavor. Made with rich, dark chocolate for a sophisticated taste.

products.description: A decadent blend of rich hot chocolate with a swirl of sweet and buttery caramel syrup, topped with whipped cream.

products.description: A warming and aromatic hot chocolate with a hint of cinnamon, nutmeg, and chili for a gentle, spicy kick.

products.description: A delicious combination of rich chocolate and the nutty, toasted flavor of hazelnut. A comforting and indulgent treat.
